summary: wait thats the mymbles daughter and not the mymble????
question: wait thats the mymbles daughter and not the mymble????
answer:
yeah! the mymble herself is a lot older, and is sitting on the steps by daddy jones. the one dancing with the joxter is the mymble’s daughter (called mumble in the anime).

the mymble’s daughter joins the oshun oxtra crew when they go by her house (she had gotten in trouble and had to stay back from daddy jones’ birthday party, and they brought her along), as well as accompanying them to find a colony!

a lot of fans haven’t read the books or gotten to the episode in the anime, which is why there is a lot of confusion ;;

summary: Is there any information on when new episodes of moominvalley will be released?
question: Is there any information on when new episodes of moominvalley will be released?
answer:
Sadly, I’m afraid that we are a little bit in the dark about what’s happening with the second season dear <3 The series did just release a few months ago, and animation can take years to finish. We are all excited and hopeful to see more content or just a little bit of news!

The only thing that I’ve learned is in May, on the first, They announced that they were working in partnership with Gutsy Animations to help with distribution across the world!

But,we should be hopeful for a second season, Moominvalley ended up being a record-breaking series in Finland! And on their app the series ended up having an average of 348,000 people view each episode!

I can only suspect that there should be a second season eventually, when that is I’m afraid we won’t know, the series has very beautiful animation but, with beautify animation takes time and money. So the best thing we can do is be patient. <3

Also here’s a source for those that would like to read more about the partnership!

PGS Brings ‘Moominvalley’ to the World as Global Distributor | Animation Magazine

blog.name: moominsinthewild
blog.title: Spotting Moomins And Mumriks Around Scandinavia
blog.description: Here in Scandinavia moomintrolls are pretty common. My name is Christine and I’m here to document them :)

summary:
Part 1/2 of the moomintroll merch from the store ‘Tilbords’
Finally went to this store. It has brand new moomintroll mugs from...
body:
Part ½ of the moomintroll merch from the store ‘Tilbords’

Finally went to this store. It has brand new moomintroll mugs from the 2019 reboot.😊

———

For the international fans out there who don’t have moomintroll merchandise everywhere and would like to buy any of these without extra cost I would be more than happy to buy something for you and send it to you. IAll you’d have to do is pay the original store price and the shipping fee (and any border tax if that happens). PM me if you are interested.

Here’s the whole wall.

blog.name: early-morning-goblin
blog.title: Mostly Moomins
blog.description: Art and other possibly revenant things

summary:
Hamilton Moomins AU anyone??
Has this been done before?
I haven’t gotten that far into everything but I do know a little bit...
body:
Hamilton Moomins AU anyone??

Has this been done before?

I haven’t gotten that far into everything but I do know a little bit about some of the characters I haven’t seen yet.

So I was originally going to make Moomin Alexander but I thought Snufkin was a far better choice (if Momomin was Alex then snufkin, the mymbles daughter, and little my would be the Schuyler sisters)

But now I’m thinking Snufkin = Alexander, Moomin = Eliza, Angelica = Alice (right???), and Peggy = Snorkmaiden.

Also if you want to be hurt the Woodies can be Snufkins and Moomins adopted children and Philip.

I’m thinking Hodgkins would be Washington????


Also I still don’t really know who is a true Aaron Burr for this AU,, please help.
